name: WKFindConfiguration
desc: The configuration parameters to use when searching the contents of the web view.

items.name: var backwards: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the search direction, relative to the current selection.

items.name: var caseSensitive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to consider case when matching the search string.

items.name: var wraps: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the search wraps around to the other side of the page.
